title: Apple opens submissions for in-person WWDC22 event on May 9
content:
As we head in to May, we inch closer to the start of Apple’s Worldwide Developers Conference (WWDC). The event will take place starting on June 6 and for most, it will be attended online. But, as mentioned during its initial announcement, the company will have a limited number of in-person attendees. If you are

The post Apple opens submissions for in-person WWDC22 event on May 9 appeared first on XDA.
description: For those that want to attend its WWDC22 live event, Apple will begin accepting submissions starting May 9. The event will be held on June 6.
